content: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.

comment.text: The "ErrorMessageBruteForceProtection" translation key is used to display an error message when a user attempts to set an invalid number of brute force protection attempts. This error appears in a label on a form input field within the Portal Settings page, specifically on the security tab.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Նշված արգումենտը վավեր արժեքների շրջանակից դուրս էր:' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values' in a natural or user-friendly way. It sounds overly technical and formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: 'Մուտքագրված տվյալը չի համապատասխանում թույլատրելի շրջանակին' (The entered data does not match the permissible range) or 'Մուտքագրված արժեքը թույլատրելի չէ' (The entered value is not allowed).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ອາກິວເມັນທີ່ລະບຸນັ້ນຢູ່ນອກຂອບເຂດຂອງຄ່າທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.' It's a literal, word-for-word translation which loses nuance and sounds unnatural in Lao. A more natural translation would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ວິຊັນນະກອນຖືກລະບຸບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງຕາມການໂຕ້ຖຽງທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ (Wisanthon thuk labu bot thuk tong tham kan to thong thi thuk tong)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation, 'Valoarea introdusă se află în afara intervalului de valori permis,' is a literal translation that doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.' It's too formal and lengthy for a user-facing error message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and user-friendly translation such as 'Valoare incorectă' or 'Valoare nevalidă' or 'Valoare incorectă. Te rog, introdu o valoare validă.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'නිරූපිත විස්තාරය වලංගු අගයන් පරාසයෙන් පිටත වේ.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.'  'විස්තාරය' (Vistharaya) typically refers to an expansion or extension, which isn't the intended meaning in this context. The term 'argument' is also not directly translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be something like 'සමర్పිත තර්කම වලංගු අගය පරාසයෙන් එහා යයි.' (Samarpaitha tharkama valangu agaya paraasayan ehaa yai.) or 'විනිසුම් කරන ලද අන්තර්ගතය වලංගු අගය පරාසයෙන් පිටත වේ.' (Vinisuum karana lada antharathaya valangu agaya paraasayan pitatha ve.)  The best option depends on the technical context and target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Специфицирани' is technically correct but sounds very formal and awkward in this context. While not strictly incorrect, it's not the most natural choice.

While technically correct, the sentence structure 'Наведен аргумент је изван опсега валидних вредности.' can be improved for better flow.  A more natural phrasing would be 'Наведен аргумент је ван дозвољеног распона вредности.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Наведен аргумент је ван дозвољеног распона вредности.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Belirtilen bağımsız değişken geçerli değer aralığının dışındaydı.' is a literal translation and doesn't quite convey the meaning of the English 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.' in a natural Turkish way. It sounds overly technical.
While technically correct, 'bağımsız değişken' is quite formal and technical. It's likely not the best choice for a user-facing error message.
